game.name: Wasteland Shop Simulator
game.shortDescription: A post-apocalyptic shop management game where you build, customize, and expand your store. Hire staff, explore the wasteland for loot, deal with messy customers and thieves, and grow your retail empire in a chaotic world gone mad.
